title: [Large-scale] Critical Thinking and Reflective Practice Enhancement Course for Strategic Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational business administration theories and basic strategic planning concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening case analysis and strategic decision-making competencies based on practical experience.

learning_goals: Applying critical thinking skills to strategic problem-solving by analyzing live cases
Systematically reflecting on decision-making processes in real business scenarios and deriving improvement strategies
Strengthening data-driven strategic planning capabilities through team-based project execution

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
